title: Commission Regulation (EC) No 1085/95 of 15 May 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3521/93 derogating from Council Regulation (EEC) No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal and repealing Regulation (EC) No 3380/93
header:
COMMISSION REGULATION (EC) No  1085/95 of 15 May 1995 amending Regulation (EC) No 3521/93 derogating from Council Regulation (EEC)  No 2067/92 on measures to promote and market quality beef and veal and repealing Regulation (EC) No  3380/93
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: In Article 1 of Regulation (EC) No 3521/93 the words 'in 1993` are  replaced by 'for the years 1993 to 1997`.

This Regulation shall enter into force on the seventh day following its publication in  the Official Journal of the European Communities.
This Regulation shall be binding in its entirety and directly applicable in all  Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 15 May 1995.
For the Commission Franz FISCHLER Member of the Commission
